document_data.name: Randolf Vammas
document_data.mainbody:
Lord '''Randolf Vammas''' was a senior member of the noble [[patriar]] [[Vammas]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]] and a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Archduke Gortash... Now there's a man who knows good business.|Lord Randolf Vammas}}
document_data.Description: Randolf Vammas was a [[human]] man with an olive complexion and red hair. He had his red beard well-trimmed and wore purple finery embroidered in gold and a wide-brimmed hat.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, shortly before the armies of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] attacked the city of Baldur's Gate, Lord Randolf Vammas was a Parliamentarian of the Gate and voted in support of crowning lowborn Lord [[Enver Gortash]] as the city's Archduke. Lord Vammas was present for Gortash's coronation that took place in the audience hall of [[Wyrm's Rock]]. Following the coronation, Lord Vammas bragged about a number of business propositions he had submitted to the new Archduke while in conversation with a fellow Parliamentarian, Lady [[Winstra Hullhollyn]].
